DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate a complete acne regimen consisting of a medication (Benzaknen® 5% Gel), and 2 cosmetic products Dermotivin® Soft Liquid soap and Cetaphil® Dermacontrol Moisturizer SPF30 in patients with acne.
DOC.brief_title: Benzac 5% Gel in Combination With Cosmetic Products in Acne Vulgaris
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective of this study is to evaluate subject satisfaction with the treatment regimen comprising Benzaknen® 5% Gel in association with 2 cosmetic products including a foam soap, Dermotivin® Soft Liquid soap, and a non comedogenic moisturizer, Cetaphil® Dermacontrol Moisturizer SPF30, in patients with mild to moderate acne, after 12 weeks of treatment.
DOC.criteria: Male or female subject of any ethnic background of 12 years or older. Subject with mild or moderate facial acne vulgaris defined as an Investigator Global Assessment (IGA) score at 2 or 3 on a 04 scale. Subject with any skin phototype according to T.B. Fitzpatrick skin phototype definitions. Subject with severe acne (IGA>3) with nodules, cysts, scars or extrafacial lesions, Female subject who is pregnant, lactating or planning a pregnancy during the study, Subject susceptible to take a corticosteroid treatment during the study except inhaled or topic when needed to treat a condition outside the face,
